type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Reverse Falchion[/i] – Lucina, Dark Past gets +1/+0 for each card you have drawn this turn.
[i]Unwind Fate[/i] – Whenever you draw your second card each turn, tap target creature you don't control.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Lucina deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. If that card was a land card, create a Treasure token. If that card was a nonland card, investigate.
